```js
    nvm install 19
    nvm install 18
    nvm install 17
    nvm install 16

    ```

```js
    nvm use node # for latest version
    nvm use 16 # for the latest version of node 16.X.X
    nvm use 12.14.3 # Specific version 
    ```

```js
    nvm alias default node
    nvm alias default 16
    nvm alias default 12.14.3 
    ```
